00004 void RenderLog::writeToLogFile(const char* line)
00005 {
00006     if (m_logfileHandle == 0) return;
00007 
00008     printf("Renderlog: %s\n", line);
00009     fputs(line, m_logfileHandle);
00010     fflush(m_logfileHandle);
00011 }

00013 RenderLog::RenderLog(const char* outputFile)
00014 {
00015   printf("Opening render log\n");
00016 
00017   m_logfileHandle = fopen(outputFile, "w");
00018 
00019   if (m_logfileHandle == 0) return;
00020 
00021   char Buffer[4098];
00022 
00023   sprintf(Buffer, "Render log\n");
00024   writeToLogFile(Buffer);
00025 
00026   //Get the current time
00027   time_t rawtime;

00029

00031   timeinfo = localtime ( &rawtime );
00032 
00033   //Write the current date and time
00034   sprintf(Buffer, "The date/time is %s\n", asctime(timeinfo));
